name: Lab Rats Inc.
description:
Lab Rats Inc. sees you escaping from a laboratory after a fire made the sprinkler system go rogue. Defeat the escaped test subjects and make it to the surface before the sprinklers drown you!

===

All art, code, and sound effects were made within a 48 hour period for the GMTK Jam 2020.

Music is from opengameart.org
